Package uk.ac.forthvalley.gradedunit.dataaccess

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.forthvalley.gradedunit.dataaccess.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class that connect the GUI(uk.ac.forthvallley.gradedunit.gui) and the data access(uk.ac.forthvalley.gradedunit.dataaccess)
Author:
Davide Kovac

    • getClient

      public java.lang.String getClient​(int clientID)

      Connect the GUI and the data access to execute the getClientInfo() method in Client class

      Parameters:
      clientID - got from the GUI
      Returns:
      Return the information from the client class that the method got from the database and send them to the GUI
